ResearchProjectDef.label: Bionics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Discovering the concept of very small motors and circuits, new possibilities of better prostheses are now open for you.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Bionics

ResearchProjectDef.label: Surrogate Organs
ResearchProjectDef.description: After gaining higher medical knowledge from research, crafting simple surrogate organs to replace missing ones becomes possible. Surrogate organs don't perform as well as natural organs, but having an organ is better than no organ.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Synthetic Organs
ResearchProjectDef.description: Further research in nano-technology allows you to create incredibly well-engineered artificial organs.
